[Title]: american gods
[Year]: ----
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Runtime]: 60 Min
[Director]: ----
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Actors]:
Emily Browning, Kristin Chenoweth, Ricky Whittle, Bruce Langley, Yetide Badaki, Peter Stormare, Pablo Schreiber, Orlando
Jones, Crispin Glover, Ian McShane
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Plot Summary]:
Based on Neil Gaiman's 2001 novel of the same name, ex-convict Shadow Moon becomes the traveling partner of a mysterious
conman named Mr. Wednesday after his release from prison. He soon discovers Mr. Wednesday is more than he seems and
becomes embroiled in an epic conflict between Old Gods and New.
